title: Mixed Reviews
description:
The Bros movie is coming out and Kevin Hart did promotion for it which made the guys relive DJ Lou's almost, kinda, sorta gay experience.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
